solution_line_template: Ryan used {initial_tokens}/{candy_crush_divisor} = <<{initial_tokens}/{candy_crush_divisor}={candy_crush_tokens}>>{candy_crush_tokens} tokens on Candy Crush.

Ryan used a total of {pacman_tokens}+{candy_crush_tokens}+{ski_ball_tokens} = <<{pacman_tokens}+{candy_crush_tokens}+{ski_ball_tokens}={total_spent_tokens}>>{total_spent_tokens} tokens on all three games.
Ryan's parents bought him {multiplier_for_new_tokens}*{ski_ball_tokens} = <<{multiplier_for_new_tokens}*{ski_ball_tokens}={new_tokens_from_parents}>>{new_tokens_from_parents} more tokens.
Ryan had {tokens_left_after_games}+{new_tokens_from_parents} = <<{tokens_left_after_games}+{new_tokens_from_parents}={final_tokens}>>{final_tokens} tokens after his parents bought him some.
